message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe would be an excellent addition to your collection. Given its value and quality, I propose a price of $15,000. This reflects not only the product's worth but also the unique opportunity it presents. I look forward to your consideration.
Alice, I appreciate your offer, but $15,000 is a bit higher than I'm comfortable with.  Considering its value to me, I'm willing to pay $10,500. Let's see if we can find some common ground.

Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. In light of this, I am willing to meet you halfway and propose a price of $11,250 for the product. I hope this offer better aligns with what you're looking for, while still reflecting the true value of the item.

Alice, I appreciate your willingness to compromise. While $11,250 is closer to my target, I'm still hoping for a slightly lower price.  I'm willing to offer $10,750.  This seems like a fair price given the value of the product to both of us. What do you think?

I appreciate your continued interest, Bob. After careful consideration, I am pleased to offer the product to you at $11,000. This price reflects the value of the item and allows for a fair transaction. I hope this proposal is more in line with what you're considering.
